alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 11 at 2:35PM MST until April 11 at 3:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MST FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 233 PM MST, a dust channel was 18 miles southeast of Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads, or 30 miles north of Kingman. HAZARD...Less than one quarter mile with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * Low visibility will continue to impact Antares Road between Route 66 and Pierce Ferry Road. Locations impacted include... Grand Canyon Skywalk, Diamond Creek Campground and Grand Canyon Ranch. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE! To report severe weather, contact the National Weather Service, or your nearest law enforcement agency, who will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Las Vegas.
